root.name: Karaoke Joysound
root.description: OverviewKaraoke Joysound is a Karaoke game developed by Hudson and published by both Hudson (Japanese release) and Konami (US release) for the Wii platform.GameplayIn Karaoke Joysound players choose a song in which they sing along to while the words are shown on screen. Karaoke Joysound can also be played by multiple players at the same time.Song Selection / RentalKaraoke Joysound contains over 30 songs on the disk but players have the option to pay with Wii Points to rent songs from an online catalog of over 1000 more songs. Wii points are used to buy tickets, these tickets are for varying amounts of rental time:24 Hour Ticket - A 24 hour ticket can be purchased using 500 Wii Points.3 Day Ticket - A 3 day ticket can be purchased using 1000 Wii Points.30 Day Ticket - A 30 day ticket can be purchased using 3000 Wii Points.
